item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
Machakans do not use horses. Instead, giant spiders found in the depths of the Machakan forests trained by witch doctors to carry riders. Spider riders are armed with bows and spears. The spider is able to throw webs to entangle distant enemies.
